title: 4 Ways to Boost Your Confidence
description:
Do you think you have to be perfect to be confident? Think again! In this bonus episode of Dear Gabby I’m sharing a live talk on confidence. It will help you to stop trying to be perfect and manifest more by just being YOU. I’ll help you see and appreciate yourself for everything you are, express your authentic truth and never, ever sweat the small stuff.

 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3PdqImm

In this talk I reference my new book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. This is the most important book I’ve written to date, and I hope you’ll read it, if you haven’t already taken the Happy Days journey.  This audiobook is now available too. https://bit.ly/3ILLDKH

If you’ve ever been curious about becoming a health coach or a wellness entrepreneur; if you've been frustrated by some Western medicine options in the past; or if you just want to do a deep dive into your own well-being, the Institute for Integrative Nutrition offers an online training program that could be a great place to start! 

To access a free online sample class and learn more about their current special offer, including how you can save up to 35% on tuition, visit this link. As a Dear Gabby listener, you’ll also receive a bonus gift package when you enroll. http://www.deargabby.com/iin

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3yJFLwQ

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

Stay well fueled this summer with Splendid Spoon. Get started today and save on an entire week of ready-made, plant-based meals. Just go to SplendidSpoon.com/GABBY for $50 off your first box when you subscribe.

 

Exclusively for Dear Gabby listeners, Feel Free Botanic Tonics is offering a 40% off discount on your first purchase just use promo code GABBY at checkout.

 

Produced by Dear Media.
